TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit PeerCollaboration extends System.Object
public ref class PeerCollaboration abstract sealed

summary.span: Interacts with the Peer Collaboration infrastructure.

span.span: Interacts with the Peer Collaboration infrastructure.

summary.span: Many of the core collaboration scenarios begin with this class.

span.span: Many of the core collaboration scenarios begin with this class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個類別是靜態類別 – 它是密封、 抽象，而且沒有公用建構函式。This class is a static class – it is sealed, abstract and does not have a public constructor. 它用來包含和管理應用程式、 物件和對等體接受邀請給共同作業工作階段的目前狀態資訊。It is used to contain and manage application, object, and presence information for peers that have accepted invitations to a collaboration session. 根據對等電腦、 物件和應用程式，PeerCollaboration 類別會提供三個存取子中，一個用於每個集合，做為介面或點的連線能力的其他任何發生在電腦上。In terms of peers, objects, and applications, the PeerCollaboration class provides three accessors, one for each collection, as an interface or point of connectivity for whatever else is happening on the machine. 這個類別無法被繼承。如果這個密封的類別指定的基底類別，會發生編譯時期錯誤。This class cannot be inherited; a compile-time error will occur if this sealed class is specified as the base class. 這個類別中方法和屬性可用來：Methods and properties in this class can be used to: - 啟動及管理共同作業應用程式Launch and manage collaborative applications - 註冊或刪除應用程式和共同作業 （例如憑證、 圖片、 虛擬人偶，以及文字描述） 的物件Register and delete applications and collaboration objects (such as certificates, pictures, avatars, and text descriptions) - 邀請的對等共同作業工作階段，包括範圍和用來識別它們在網際網路上的物件等項目Invite peers to collaboration sessions, including items such as scope and objects which will identify them over the Internet - 允許對等和共同作業基礎結構管理清單的連絡人，或彼此發行它們的存在Allow peers to and of the collaboration infrastructure, manage lists of contacts, or publish their presence to each other - 利用屬性和事件來協調非同步應用程式通訊，尤其是的名稱、 目前狀態、 應用程式或其他物件中的變更。Utilize properties and events to coordinate asynchronous application communication, especially for changes in name, presence, application, or other objects. 「 連結-本機雲端 」、 「 子網路呼叫的對等 」，和 「 NearMe 範圍 」 都是同義字的詞彙。"Link-local cloud", "subnet of the calling peer", and "NearMe scope" are synonymous terms. 「 網際網路領域 」 和 「 無伺服器的目前狀態 」 的意義相同。"Internet scope" and "serverless presence" are synonymous. 網站-本機有沒有對等共同作業的命名空間中。The site-local has no equivalent in the collaboration namespace. 每個方法或屬性，這個類別中的使用，您需要的。The use of every method or property in this class requires a of . 對等共同作業工作階段開始時，會建立此狀態。This state is created when the peer collaboration session begins.

summary.span: Gets the object that contains information needed when an application is started due to a collaboration request from a remote peer.

span.span: Gets the object that contains information needed when an application is started due to a collaboration request from a remote peer.

value.span: 如果啟動應用程式的邀請，因為包含傳送應用程式邀請，邀請本身之對等的兩個資訊的物件會傳回，否則傳回。

span.span: If the application was started due to an invitation, a object that contains both information about the peer that sent the application invitation and the invitation itself is returned; otherwise, is returned.
The default value for this property is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性是供共同作業感知以判斷是否已啟動因為從遠端對等共同作業要求啟動後的執行個體。This property is to be used by a collaboration-aware instance after it is started to determine whether it was started due to a collaboration request from a remote peer. 呼叫的應用程式應該檢查和屬性，以取得進一步的邀請要求的相關資訊。The calling application should inspect the and properties to get further information about the invitation request. 存取這個屬性需要的。Access to this property requires a of . 此狀態時，會建立共同作業工作階段開始。This state is created when the collaboration session begins.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 對等物件會自動取消註冊 （移除） 從對等共同作業基礎結構當物件的參考不再有效。Peer objects are automatically unregistered (removed) from the Peer Collaboration infrastructure when a reference to the object is no longer valid. 如果呼叫端不會維護物件的參考，則對等共同作業基礎結構從取消註冊。If a caller does not maintain a reference to the object, it is unregistered from the Peer Collaboration infrastructure. 或者，您可以手動使用此方法註冊物件。Alternatively, an object can be manually unregistered by using this method. 呼叫這個方法需要的。Calling this method requires a of . 此狀態時，會建立共同作業工作階段開始。This state is created when the collaboration session begins.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法可讓物件參與的範圍的物件已登錄的遠端對等查詢。This method allows the object to be queried by remote peers participating in the scope in which the object was registered. 如果先前已註冊物件，這個方法會更新註冊。If the object was previously registered, this method updates its registration. 如果已註冊的物件超出範圍時，可以擷取透過方法。If a registered object falls out of scope, it can be retrieved via the method. 資料部分大小必須小於或等於 16384 個位元組。The size of the data portion of the must be less than or equal to 16,384 bytes. 存取此方法需要的。Access to this method requires a of . 此狀態時，會建立共同作業工作階段開始。This state is created when the collaboration session begins.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不一定是唯一的顯示名稱。Display names are not necessarily unique. 使用者應該確認透過電子郵件、 使用顯示名稱的使用者的身分識別電話，或親自接受共同作業邀請之前。Users should verify the identity of the person using the display name by email, phone, or in person before accepting a collaboration invitation. 此函式會將使用者登入共同作業基礎結構。This function signs the users into the Collaboration Infrastructure. 存取此方法需要的。Access to this method requires a of . 此狀態時，會建立共同作業工作階段開始。This state is created when the collaboration session begins. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例說明如何將使用者登入的共同作業基礎結構。The following code example illustrates how to sign the users into the Collaboration infrastructure. [!code-csharp[NCLPNRPContacts#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLPNRPContacts/CS/NCLPNRPContacts.cs#1)]

summary.span: Gets the to which the calling peer can publish presence, capability and object information.

span.span: Gets the to which the calling peer can publish presence, capability and object information.

value.span: 指定呼叫的對等體即將參與所在範圍的物件。

span.span: object that specifies the scope in which the calling peer will participate.
The default value for this property is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 對等的主機或主機應用程式可能會限制或使用不同的範圍的方式區分共同作業活動的對等電腦參與。The peer host or host application may limit or differentiate peer participation in collaboration activities by using separate scopes. 呼叫端的對等應該檢查以判斷哪些進一步的動作，它可以成功地執行這個方法的傳回值。The calling peer should inspect the return value from this method to determine what further actions it can successfully perform.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig void SignOut(valuetype System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerScope peerScope) cil managed

span.span: Scope enumeration specified by .

summary.span: Signs the peer out of the specified scope.

span.span: Signs the peer out of the specified scope.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法是應用程式特定的作業，而且登出，可能會影響其他可能在目前執行的應用程式。This method is not an application-specific operation and signing out may affect other applications that may be currently running. 如果使用者尚未登入指定的範圍內呼叫此方法會不產生任何作用。If the user is not already signed into the specified scope calling this method results in a no-op. 當使用者登出近端分享時，其已發行的資訊都會從刪除端點物件集。When a user signs out of People Near Me, their published information is deleted from the endpoint object set. 這包括和，除了任何呼叫端的對等共同作業基礎結構中註冊的物件識別。This includes and , in addition to any identifying objects registered by the calling peer into the collaboration infrastructure. 此資訊會被刪除，因為它不再提供給遠端對等電腦或對等共同作業的主機。Because this information is deleted, it is no longer available to either remote peers or a peer host for collaboration. 觀點的類別，其他共用相同的信任的連絡人資訊無關; 使用類別不會影響其他物件中的這項資訊永續性，例如遠端對等物件。From the perspective of the class, other sharing of the same information with trusted contacts is not relevant; use of the class does not affect other objects in which this information was persisted, such as a remote peer object. 同樣地，刪除從對等不會影響在共同作業應用程式; 它是否存在其他連絡人是仍然可以檢視其目前狀態和與其共同作業。Likewise, deleting a peer from the does not affect its presence in a collaboration application; other contacts are still able to view its presence and collaborate with it. 呼叫這個方法需要的。Calling this method requires a of . 此狀態時，會建立共同作業工作階段開始。This state is created when the collaboration session begins.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 正在移除註冊呼叫的對等用戶端接收的共同作業邀請，它就會停止。Unregistering a stops the calling peer from receiving collaboration invitations for it. 如果先前未註冊已解除登錄應用程式，這不是任何作業。If the application being unregistered was not previously registered, this is a no-op. 呼叫這個方法需要的。Calling this method requires a of . 此狀態時，會建立共同作業工作階段開始。This state is created when the collaboration session begins.
